ud4.9:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud4.9:3.3: Atha kho āyasmato upasenassa vaṅgantaputtassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
ud4.9:3.4: “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, satthā ca me bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho;
ud4.9:3.5: svākkhāte camhi dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito;
ud4.9:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato upasenassa vaṅgantaputtassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
